Rotatus.text: Telegram received, cannot meet you until ---

Rotula.text: Telegram received, cannot understand its meaning, wire again in different words

Rotundus.text: Telegram received, have done as you'requested

Rubellus.text: Telegram received, have written you fully

Rubrica.text: Telegram received, orders cancelled, and subsequent ones substituted

Rugosus.text: Telegram received too late for post

Ruiturus.text: Telegram received, will meet you at ---

Rumpus.text: Telegram received, will meet you as desired

Runcator.text: Telegram received, will do as you wish

Runco.text: Telegram and letter received, having attention

Ruptor.text: Telegram and letter received, having attention, will write

Rursum.text: Reply immediately to telegram sent on ---

Rurum.text: There is no telegram from you here, wire to me at once to ---

Ruscario.text: There is no telegram from you here, wire to me at once to this address

Ruscarium.text: There is no telegram from you here, wire to me to Poste Restante at ---

Ruscum.text: There is no telegram from you here, wire to me to Poste Restante here

Rusticitas.text: Telegraph him [or her] at Poste Restante ---
